      • publish

        public boolean publish(java.lang.String type)
        Description copied from interface: RtmpPublisher
        Issues an RTMP "publish" command and write the media content stream packets (audio and video).
        Specified by:
        publish in interface RtmpPublisher
        Parameters:
        type - specify the way to publish raw RTMP packets among "live", "record" and "append"
        Returns:
        If succeeded return true else return false
